episodes.title: Ep. 2 - Cults: Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description: In this episode ofParanoid Perspectives, we dive into the controversial world of Jehovah’s Witnesses—examining cult-like control, shunning, secrecy, and much more within the organization. Is it just a strict religion, or does it fit the definition of a cult? 🤔 ⚠️Trigger Warning: This episode contains discussions on cults, religion, and sexual abuse. Listener discretion is advised.
